feed.title: Jakazzy
feed.subtitle: Learn software engineering in public, build projects, share what has been learnt with others and repeat.

entry.title: Learning how to learn -Notes
entry.summary: One important trait that guarantees growth is constant learning. However, as much as we all seem to learn every day, we do sometimes find ourselves sometimes experiencing challenges in learning such as the dreaded-by-all valley: illusions of competence. Personally, discovering Learning How to Learn by Barbara Oakley was just beyond exciting. It brought to perspective mental models in learning, ...
